response.overview: Itâ€™s 1979. The disco was an escape from real life, a place to find love, and a moment to last forever in a dance. Except nothing can last forever, just like the dance that stops when the music ends. Frank is an ordinary guy, but when he stepped inside that Disco, he was special. One night, Frank believes that all of the answers to his problems will be solved when he wins the dance contest.
response.title: The Last Disco
